Anml - Whirlpool

Whirlpool

Changing behaviors in the kitchen

Services
  • Visual Design
  • Development
  • Strategy
Results
  • Webby
  • W3 Award

Working closely with Whirlpool we created a smart oven interface pioneering the future of autonmous cooking

The countertop smart oven automatically detects what you have placed inside and cooks it to perfection based on your preferences. Working closely with the WHR team, ANML had to change common user behaviours. We architected an experience that taught users to let the product do the work for them while also accounting for those that wanted to use the product in a traditional way.

A new way to interact
